title: Disconnects in the past week
body: In the past week i have twice disconnected from a game only to re-log to the regular client screen, able to start a new game.  Was wondering if anyone else has encountered this, and wondering how/why...

replies.body: This might have been some kind of weird hiccup, but let's go ahead and run you through some quick troubleshooting steps for your network using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Pay extra attention to the steps on port forwarding and flushing your DNS, and let me know if that doesn't help!
